RAppShell.aiPrompt: Create complete app layout with header and sidebar
RAppShell.commonUse: main app layout, admin dashboards, enterprise applications, SaaS platforms
RAppShell.description: Complete application shell with header, sidebar, navigation, search, and theme support. Zero-config setup for enterprise Blazor applications with professional styling and full responsiveness.
RAppShell.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple pages without navigation. Use RSection for content organization instead.

patterns.full-enterprise: All parameters for complete enterprise application
patterns.zero-config: Title only for minimal app setup

RAppShell.name: RAppShell

RTabItem.aiPrompt: Create individual tab item for RTabs container
RTabItem.commonUse: tab content organization, document tabs, settings sections
RTabItem.description: Individual tab item component for RTabs container with icon, badge, and content support. Supports closable tabs, disabled states, and badge notifications for professional tab experiences.
RTabItem.avoidUsage: Don't use outside RTabs container. Use RButton for standalone buttons.

patterns.basic-tab: Text and ChildContent for simple tab item

RTabItem.name: RTabItem

RDatePicker.aiPrompt: Create a date/time picker with calendar popup and validation
RDatePicker.commonUse: date selection, appointment scheduling, event planning, form dates
RDatePicker.description: Professional date and time picker with calendar popup and time selection
RDatePicker.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple date input - use RDatePickerBasic instead
RDatePicker.name: RDatePicker

RDivider.aiPrompt: Create a professional divider for visual separation
RDivider.commonUse: section separation, menu dividers, form sections, content organization
RDivider.description: Professional divider component for visual separation with text support and multiple styles. Supports horizontal/vertical orientation, customizable styling, and automatic menu integration.
RDivider.avoidUsage: Don't overuse - only for logical content separation. Avoid decorative usage.

patterns.simple-divider: No parameters for basic horizontal line

RDivider.name: RDivider

RTabs.aiPrompt: Create professional tabs for content organization
RTabs.commonUse: dashboards, forms, data views, settings panels, multi-step workflows
RTabs.description: Professional tab container for organizing content with smooth animations and enterprise styling. Supports multiple variants, badges, closable tabs, keyboard navigation, and accessibility.
RTabs.avoidUsage: Don't use for navigation breadcrumbs - use RBreadcrumbs instead. Avoid for simple toggles.

patterns.basic-tabs: RTabs with RTabItem children for content organization
patterns.badge-tabs: BadgeCount on RTabItem for notification indicators
patterns.closable-tabs: IsClosable="true" on RTabItem for document-style tabs

RTabs.name: RTabs

RDropdown.aiPrompt: Create dropdown menu for item selection
RDropdown.commonUse: select menus, action menus, option lists, context menus
RDropdown.description: Professional dropdown component for item selection with keyboard navigation and accessibility. Supports custom triggers, loading states, search filtering, and flexible item rendering.
RDropdown.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple text inputs - use RFormField instead. Avoid for navigation - use RNavMenu.

patterns.basic-dropdown: Items list with TriggerContent for basic selection
patterns.action-dropdown: Button trigger with action items for context menus

RDropdown.name: RDropdown

RFormSection.aiPrompt: Create a form section with header and organized field layout
RFormSection.commonUse: form organization, grouped fields, collapsible sections, multi-step forms
RFormSection.description: Professional form section container with collapsible header and grid layout
RFormSection.avoidUsage: Don't use for single fields or when no grouping is needed
RFormSection.name: RFormSection

RForm.aiPrompt: Create a professional form container with validation and submission handling
RForm.commonUse: user registration, data entry, settings forms, contact forms
RForm.description: Professional form component with validation, state management, and accessibility
RForm.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple single-field inputs or display-only content
RForm.name: RForm

RFormField.aiPrompt: Create a professional form field for user input with validation
RFormField.commonUse: text input, email validation, password fields, dropdowns, checkboxes, file uploads
RFormField.description: Universal form field component with professional validation and utility-first CSS
RFormField.avoidUsage: Don't use for display-only data or readonly content
RFormField.name: RFormField

RSwitcher.aiPrompt: Create a switcher for selecting between multiple options or states
RSwitcher.commonUse: tab switching, view toggles, option selection, filters
RSwitcher.description: Professional switcher component for toggling between multiple options
RSwitcher.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple on/off toggles - use checkbox instead
RSwitcher.name: RSwitcher

RSection.aiPrompt: Create content section with header and body
RSection.commonUse: page sections, content organization, collapsible panels, form groups
RSection.description: Professional content section component with header, collapsible content, and footer areas. Ideal for organizing page content with consistent styling and optional interactive features.
RSection.avoidUsage: Don't use for main app layout - use RAppShell instead. Avoid for simple content without headers.

patterns.basic-section: Title and ChildContent for simple content sections
patterns.action-section: TitleContent for sections with header actions
patterns.icon-section: Icon and Title for branded section headers

RSection.name: RSection

RFileUpload.aiPrompt: Create a file upload component with drag-drop and file validation
RFileUpload.commonUse: document upload, image upload, file attachments, media upload
RFileUpload.description: Professional file upload component with drag-drop, validation, and preview
RFileUpload.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple text input or when files are not needed
RFileUpload.name: RFileUpload

RButton.aiPrompt: Create a professional button for user actions
RButton.description: Professional button component with enterprise variants, AI-optimized for rapid development. Supports 9 variants, 5 sizes, loading states, elevation effects, and comprehensive accessibility.
RButton.avoidUsage: Don't use for navigation links - use RLink instead. Avoid for simple text without actions.

patterns.icon-button: Icon="icon_name" IconPosition="IconPosition.Start" for buttons with icons
patterns.destructive-action: Variant="ButtonVariant.Danger" for destructive actions like Delete, Remove
patterns.secondary-action: Variant="ButtonVariant.Secondary" for supporting actions like Cancel, Back
patterns.primary-action: Variant="ButtonVariant.Primary" for main actions like Save, Submit, Create

RButton.name: RButton

RActionGroup.aiPrompt: Create a professional action group for organizing buttons
RActionGroup.commonUse: form actions, toolbar buttons, navigation controls, modal actions
RActionGroup.description: Professional action group component for organizing multiple buttons with consistent spacing and alignment. Supports horizontal/vertical layouts, responsive behavior, and flexible alignment options.
RActionGroup.avoidUsage: Don't use for single buttons - use RButton directly. Avoid for non-action content.
RActionGroup.name: RActionGroup

RCard.aiPrompt: Create a professional card for content display
RCard.commonUse: dashboards, data display, content organization, information panels
RCard.description: Professional card component for content containers with business-grade variants. Supports header, media, content areas, loading states, elevation effects, and comprehensive interaction patterns.
RCard.avoidUsage: Don't use for navigation - use RLink instead. Avoid for simple text without structure.

patterns.basic-card: Title="Card Title" Content="Card content" for simple content cards
patterns.elevated-card: Elevation="4" for cards that need prominence
patterns.media-card: ImageSrc="/image.jpg" ImageAlt="Description" for cards with images

RCard.name: RCard

RBreadcrumbs.aiPrompt: Create breadcrumb navigation for page hierarchy
RBreadcrumbs.commonUse: page navigation, hierarchy display, user location indication
RBreadcrumbs.description: Professional breadcrumb navigation component for showing page hierarchy and navigation paths. Supports icons, custom separators, responsive collapsing, and accessibility features.
RBreadcrumbs.avoidUsage: Don't use for primary navigation - use RNavMenu instead. Avoid for single-level pages.

patterns.custom-separator: Separator or SeparatorIcon for custom dividers
patterns.icon-breadcrumbs: BreadcrumbItem with Icon property for visual hierarchy

RBreadcrumbs.name: RBreadcrumbs

RBadge.aiPrompt: Create a professional badge for status or count display
RBadge.commonUse: status indicators, counts, labels, notifications, tags
RBadge.description: Professional badge component for status indicators, counts, and labels. Supports multiple variants, sizes, and interactive states with enterprise-grade styling.
RBadge.avoidUsage: Don't use for navigation buttons - use RButton instead. Avoid for large text content.
RBadge.name: RBadge

RNavMenu.aiPrompt: Create navigation menu for app sidebar
RNavMenu.commonUse: sidebar navigation, main menu, hierarchical navigation, app structure
RNavMenu.description: Professional navigation menu component for sidebar and main navigation with hierarchical support. Supports collapsible groups, badges, icons, and responsive behavior for enterprise applications.
RNavMenu.avoidUsage: Don't use for breadcrumbs - use RBreadcrumbs instead. Avoid for action menus - use RDropdown.

patterns.hierarchical-nav: NavMenuItem with Children for nested menu structure
patterns.basic-nav: Items list with NavMenuItem objects for simple navigation
patterns.badge-nav: NavMenuItem with Badge for notifications and counts

RNavMenu.name: RNavMenu

RAvatar.aiPrompt: Create a professional avatar for user representation
RAvatar.commonUse: user profiles, team members, contact lists, navigation headers
RAvatar.description: Professional avatar component for user representation with status indicators and interactive features. Supports images, initials, icons, status badges, and notification counts with responsive sizing.
RAvatar.avoidUsage: Don't use for decorative icons - use Icon component instead. Avoid for non-user content.

patterns.user-avatar: ImageSrc="/avatar.jpg" Alt="User Name" for profile pictures

RAvatar.name: RAvatar

RDatePickerBasic.aiPrompt: Create a simple HTML5 date picker input
RDatePickerBasic.commonUse: simple date input, forms, basic date selection
RDatePickerBasic.description: Simplified HTML5 date picker for basic date input scenarios
RDatePickerBasic.avoidUsage: Don't use for complex date ranges or when calendar popup is needed
RDatePickerBasic.name: RDatePickerBasic

RFormModal.aiPrompt: Create a modal with auto-generated form fields from a model
RFormModal.commonUse: quick edit modals, auto-generated forms, dynamic data entry
RFormModal.description: Generic form modal component for dynamic form generation and validation
RFormModal.avoidUsage: Don't use for complex custom forms - create dedicated form components instead
RFormModal.name: RFormModal

RSectionDivider.aiPrompt: Create a professional section divider for content organization
RSectionDivider.commonUse: page sections, form organization, content separation, feature grouping
RSectionDivider.description: Professional section divider component for organizing content areas with titles, icons, and visual separation. Supports multiple sizes, alignments, and semantic variants with enterprise-grade styling.
RSectionDivider.avoidUsage: Don't overuse - only for logical section breaks. Avoid for simple line separation.

patterns.titled-section: Title="User Settings" Icon="settings" for labeled content sections

RSectionDivider.name: RSectionDivider

componentUsage.forms: Use form-grid--2 for dual-column layouts, Required="true" for mandatory fields
componentUsage.buttons: Use ButtonVariant.Primary for main actions, Secondary for supporting actions, Danger for destructive actions
componentUsage.cards: Use RCard for content containers, combine with elevation-4 and glass-light for professional appearance
componentUsage.spacing: Use pa-6 for card content, gap-4 for flex layouts, mb-4 for standard element separation

accessibility.focus: Focus rings automatically applied to interactive elements
accessibility.colors: All color combinations meet WCAG AA contrast requirements

textSize.aiHint: Use text-h4 for section headers, text-body-1 for content

textWeight.aiHint: Use font-semibold for emphasis, font-medium for buttons

elevation.aiHint: Use elevation-4 for cards, elevation-8 for modals, elevation-lift for hover
elevation.description: Material Design elevation system with interactive states

glassmorphism.aiHint: Use glass-light for subtle effects, glass-medium for prominence
glassmorphism.description: Modern glassmorphism effects with backdrop filters

grid.aiHint: Use d-grid grid-cols-2 gap-4 for two-column layouts
grid.description: CSS Grid utilities for complex layouts

flexbox.aiHint: Use d-flex justify-between align-center for header layouts

statsGrids.aiHint: Use stats-grid for metric cards layout

gap.aiHint: Use gap-4 for standard spacing in flex/grid layouts

margin.aiHint: Use mx-auto for centering, mb-4 for standard spacing

padding.aiHint: Use pa-6 for standard card padding, px-4 py-2 for buttons
padding.description: Padding utilities following design system scale

--color-[category]-[variant].aiHint: Use --color-text-primary for main text, --color-background-elevated for cards

--z-{layer}.aiHint: Use --z-modal for overlays, --z-tooltip for highest priority

--transition-{speed}.aiHint: Use --transition-normal for most interactions, --transition-fast for hover

--radius-{size}.aiHint: Use --radius-md for cards, --radius-full for circular elements

--shadow-{variant}.aiHint: Use --shadow-md for cards, --shadow-lg for modals, --shadow-lift for hover

--gradient-{variant}.aiHint: Use --gradient-subtle for backgrounds, --gradient-executive for premium feel
